master.commit_message: [core] Fixed: properly handle strings with NULL characters inside (#2804).
[docs] Fix typos, remove trailing spaces (#2808).

[core] Added more elaborate log suppression (#2733).

Applied to RCV-DROPPED logs.

[core] Extracted IP family dependent changes in stats tools (#2799)

from #2677.

[core] Fix lacking mutex protection of some ACK-related fields (#2723).

Repeated fix for #2706.
[core] A crypto service provider based on Botan (#2700).

[core] Refax-only (with temporary differences) for 2677 (#2798).

Socketoptions: exported the check for fitting payload size setting to a separate function.
CSndBuffer and CRateEstimator get an extra parameter for IP family to be used later.
In core.h, removed unused function and added payloadSize() that should be used to return payload size after connection.
[core] Spare code for debugging high bitrate sending (#2504).

[core] Fixed C4267 warning on MSVC (#2675).

Also apps and tests.

[core] Changed conditions for setting callbacks (#2683).

The conditions for `srt_listen_callback` and `srt_connect_callback` are that they can only be modified prior to listening or connecting, simultaneously they can be also set to NULL.
[apps] Added url percent decoding to url query string keys and values.
[core] Pre-refax of change-independent parts for #2677 (#2797).

[docs] Fixed API doc: SRT_INVALID_SOCK instead of SRT_ERROR in str_accept (#2785).

The functions srt_accept() and srt_accept_bond() return a SRTSOCKET.
In case of error, the returned value is SRT_INVALID_SOCK, not SRT_ERROR.
In practice, the two values are identical (-1) but they do not have
the same semantics.

[build] Added missing public header files in Windows binary installer (#2784).

The header file access_control.h was added to the source tree
at some point but was not added to the Windows installer.
[core] Fixed SRT_ATTR_REQUIRES use.
[apps] Fixed conditional IP_ADD_SOURCE_MEMBERSHIP in testmedia (#2780).
[API] SRT version raised to 1.5.3.
[core] Added maximum BW limit for retransmissions (#2714).
[apps] Fix the build for target without IP_ADD_SOURCE_MEMBERSHIP (#2779).
[core] Drop unencrypted packets in GCM mode.
[core] Initialize ISN and PeerISN in CUDT.
[core] Minor code clean up in CRateEstimator.
[core] Fix: In rendezvous when processing resulted in ACCEPT it was still sending rejection
[core] Rejection not undertaken in rendezvous after KMX failure (#2692).

[core] Slightly optimize the RCV drop by message number (#2686).

Some minor improvements of logs and comments.
[core] fix tsbpd() may deadlock with processCtrlShutdown()

[core] Fix hang up on not enough space in the RCV buffer (#2745).

When there is space available in the receiving buffer after it is full,
send an ack to allow the sender to resume transmission.
Reschedule sending if ACK decreases the flight span after sending is congested.

Co-authored-by: Maxim Sharabayko <maxlovic@gmail.com>
[core] Refactor CRcvQueue::storePkt(..) for better resource management (#2775).
[core] Fix memory leak when can't buffer a HS packet (#2757).
[tests] Added custom main with transparent parameters for tests (#2681).
[docs] Updating the explicit information for binding to IPv6 wildcard (#2765).
[core] Fixed RCV buffer initialization in Rendezvous.
[core] Perf improvement of group reading.
[core] Removed unused CUDTGroup::m_Positions.
[core] Fixed group read-ready epoll events.
[core] Fixed srctime from closing socket was mistakenly cleared
[core] Add volatile keyword to asm block in rdtsc (#2759).
[core] Use overlapped WSASendTo to avoid loss in UDP sending (#2632).
[core] Fixed unhandled error in haicrypt (#2685).
[build] Fix downversioning of _WIN32_WINNT (#2754).
[docs] Minor updates to AEAD docs plus changed v1.6.0 to 1.5.2 in some files

[core] Correct remaining endianness issues

Fixes the last two remaining test failures on big-endian.  These
operations were all already no-ops on little-endian, and unnecessarily
byteswapped the IP addresses on big-endian.

Closes: https://github.com/Haivision/srt/issues/2697

[build] Add -Wshadow=local to CMake build flags.
Supported since GCC 7.0.
[tests] Minor fix of variable shadowing.
[core] Minor fix of variable shadowing.
[core] Fixed various compiler warnings on various platforms (#2679).

[core] Fixed FEC Emergency resize crash (#2717).

Fixed minimum history condition.
[docs] Added the link for registration in slack to the getting started table (#2721).
[build] Upgraded CI: ubuntu to version 20.04 (#2682).

[core] Fix crypto mode auto for listener sender (#2711).


Co-authored-by: oviano <ovcollyer@mac.com>
[core] Fixed typos in MBedTLS where it referred to GnuTLS (#2699).
[core] Fix peer filter config being rejected because of endianness
[apps] Fixed crash in srt-test-multiplex on medium error (#2688).

[core] Added rejection handshake sent to the peer in rendezvous mode (#2667).

Fixed: send SHUTDOWN also in blocking mode.
Added fallback ROGUE reject reason case it isn't set.
[apps] Added 'bind' parameter handling for applications (#2672).
[docs] Changed the buffer size description to be clearer (#2670).
[build] Set serial running unit tests property (#2671).
[core] Added missing thread watchdog ticks in 3 thread loop (#2669).
[core] Fixed old ENABLE_AEAD_PREVIEW.

[core] Reworked the CRcvBuffer::dropMessage(..) function (#2661).

Drop by seqno offset first, then refine using msgno.
[docs] Added SRTO_PBKEYLEN negotiation table (#2659).
[core] Removed duplicate lines (#2660).

[core] Fixed CRcvBuffer::dropMessage (#2657).

Tell what to do with existing packets.
Fixed pkt seqno dropping loop range.
[core] Fixed guard for rcv-rexmit fields (#1859).
[core] Fixed warnings and removed redundant includes (#2658).

[core] Reduce frequency of the decryption failure log (#2602).

Added `SRT_LOG_SLOWDOWN_FREQ_MS` build option.

[core] Disabled warnings various platforms and fixed C++20 Windows build (#2411).

* Disabled some warnings.
* Include platform_sys.h in some files to disable warnings.
* DIsabled deprecated declarations warning under clang.
* Include platform_sys.h in cryspr.c.
* Proper fix for ambiguous-reversed-operator warning.
* Proper fix for deprecated-declarations warning.
* Proper fixes for shorten-64-to-32 (clang).
* Proper fixes for MSVC warnings 4101, 4133, 4244, 4267.
* Remove disabling of MSVC warnings 4251, 26712.
[build] Fixed CodeQL configuration (#2644).

[core] Set CLOSING state when closing a socket (#2643).

Signaling the GC prematurely after closing a socket to reduce closing time.


Co-authored-by: Maxim Sharabayko <maxlovic@gmail.com>
[core] Drop undecrypted packet based on sequence number (#2654).
[tests] Added check for read-ready for decryption failure case (#2609).
[core] Fixed invalid ASSERT checking outdated object in haicrypt (#2652).
[build] Use CXX 14 in MacOS GitHub Action.
[docs] Fixed formatting and minor errors in srt_bind API doc (#2642).

[core] Refaxed and fixed multiplexer reusage (#2608).

Fixed ReuseAddr tests.
[core] Fix crash when enable heavy log and socket id less than 10 (#2619).
[build] Add CodeQL workflow for GitHub code scanning (#2578).

[build] Fix builds where the C++ runtime library does not have std::put_time() (#2439).

The original checks are not sufficient. For instance when building on Ubuntu14 with the Clang-3.4 compiler. This likely fixes other builds as well.
[core] CodeQL: operation requires 22 bytes.
[core] CodeQL warning: checking NULL after new.
[core] Fixed PKTINFO case that was failing for IPv4+IPv6 bound sockets (#2630).
[core] Fixed wrong null-safety condition check in haicrypt (#2616).
[core] Removed extra redundant condition checks (#2615).
[core] Fix negative id when wrap around
[docs] Fixed invalid link 2-srt_km_state (#2614).

[core] Fixed reject reason by a caller if connection is UNSECURE (#2622).

Case: the listener with relaxed encryption, the caller with enforced encryption.
[build] Use GTest from brew in MacOS action. (#2607)

[core] Fixed default reject reason for a listener callback (#2605).

It also fixes the wrong handling of a listener's rejection response.
[docs] Added package version badges (#2604).
[API] Fixed #ifdef ENABLE_AEAD_API_PREVIEW (#2603).
[API] SRT version raised to 1.5.2.
[core] AEAD: don't break a connection on decrypt failure.

[docs] Removed LGTM badges from README.

LGTM is deprecated.
[core] RCV Buffer Refax: added some utils and simplifications (#2522).

[core] AES-GCM payload length check (#2591).

The negotiated MTU size value is used to determine the maximum allowed payload size.
Fixed CSndBuffer::addBufferFromFile.
[core] Allow fileCC in group mode

[core] Added extraction of IP_PKTINFO when reading (#456).

Providing source NIC when replying back.

[apps] Added examples for message mode transmission (#2592).

Fixed example build issues.
[docs] groupconnect option value "1" (instead of "true") (#2590)
[apps] Fix ENABLE_AEAD_API_PREVIEW in apps. (#2588)

[API] Restored resetlogfa(..) in udt.h.
Reverting #2558, although udt.h is not the official SRT API.
[API] Added ENABLE_AEAD_API_PREVIEW build option to enable AEAD API.
[core] Fix CRcvBuffer last position in getTimespan_ms (#2579).

[API] Crypto mode 'auto' implemented for listener (#2574).



Co-authored-by: stevomatthews <smatthews@haivision.com>

[core] Remove use variable length array (#2279).

Use srt::FixedArray.

Co-authored-by: Maxim Sharabayko <maxlovic@gmail.com>
[apps] Examples: wait 1 sec until receiver completes (#2572).
[docs] AES-GCM is only allowed if TSBPD is enabled.
[api] Socket Options: do not allow AES GCM if TSBPD is disabled.
[docs] Fixed SRTO_PASSPHRASE length range.

[docs] Address multiple typo fixes. (#2570)


Signed-off-by: Tomoya Fujita <Tomoya.Fujita@sony.com>
Co-authored-by: Steve Matthews <smatthews@haivision.com>
[core] Fixed missing DROPREQ for LOSSREPORT that partially predates ACK (#2498).

[core] Reject caller to caller connection (#2562).

Reject RID for id=0 if not rendezvous.
[core] Refax: moved removal of one seq from fresh loss list to a separate function (#2521).
[core] Obtain ConnectionLock while sending crypto keys.
[build] Travis: display stack trace by gdb on crash (#2565).

[core] Fixed a warning: member referenced before initialized (#2433).

CPacket::m_nHeader is default-initialized.
But GCC12 produces a warning.
[core] Refax: remove usage of LOGF/HLOGF (#2566).
[docs] Added lacking SRTO_BINDTODEVICE for srt_config_add (#2564).
[build] Run codecov only after success in Travis.
[core] Refax: removed m_iRcvLastSkipAck and its dependencies (#2546).
[core] Pass std::string by const ref where possible.

[tests] Splitting ListenCallback test into 3 separate tests (#2556).

Fixed proper setup/teardown.
[core] Applied clang-format on md5.cpp and md5.h.

[core] MD5: Removed null pointer subtraction
(may have undefined behavior).

[core] Fixed rendezvous connection in the Non Blocking Mode (#2548).

Do not reject incoming packet with id=0 when rendezvous.
[docs] Fixed wrong description of PBKEYLEN conflict resolution (#2513).
[core] Fixed cloning the RX crypto context (AEAD)
[core] Moved KM refresh in packUniqueData() (#2541).

[core] Fixed TARGET_OS_MAC not defined.
Wrong include order.
[build] Disable ConnectionTimeout test (blocking), Win GitHub Action (#2543).
[build] Upgrade to checkout@v3 GitHub action.
[core] fix CSndBuffer parameter incorrect in AES GCM mode

[test] Bonding: fixed closing the listener socket. (#2538)

The listener socket was left open after exiting the function.

[build] Identify parameters with a prepended -l in CMAKE_CXX_IMPLICIT_LINK_LIBRARIES

Normally, the libraries listed in CMAKE_CXX_IMPLICIT_LINK_LIBRARIES
are of the form of either an absolute file name (which is
already handled) or a plain library base name without prefixes
or suffixes.

In some cases, it may also be a literal linker option in the
form -l<value>. This seems to happen when the compiler driver
specifies -l:<literalfilename>.

This avoids creating bogus pkg-config entries when building with
llvm-mingw, with -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=-static-libgcc, which makes
CMAKE_CXX_IMPLICIT_LINK_LIBRARIES end up with one entry being
"-l:libunwind.a".
[docs] Added a note on activating HAICRYPT logging (#2529)
[core] Refax/postfix: further fixes after last refax changes (#2528)

[core] Fixed validation of input parameters in srt_connect (#2520).

Parameters: name and namelen.
[core] Cleanup of bonding conditionals and unused code (#2525).
[core] Fixed connected peer address recording (#2526)
[core] Fixed CRcvBuffer::getAvailSize() may jump around. (#2490)
[core] Refax: safety improvements for RCV loss list and closing state (#2517)

[core] Extract RCV buffer insertion handling to a separate function (#2500).

Fixed the rexmit flag handling by AEAD.
[core] Refax: added size cache to the group container (#2510).

[core] Refax: improve logging and code readability around specific logging (#2511).

Fixed non-compiling conditional debug code.

[core] Refax: removed the synconmsg property and its handling in the group (#2509)

The SRT_GFLAG_SYNCONMSG flag cannot be set on a group (not implemented).
The incoming connection request processing still retains the check for the flag to be unset.
[core] Don't consider tool old ACK as IPE, it' may caused by network.
[core] Fixed a false alarm: ACK ERROR...(diff -1)
[core] Fixed the inconsistency between getFirstLostSeq() and ackDataUpTo() (#2488)
[core] Reduced calls to steady_clock::now() from two to one.
[apps] Added cryptomode URI query option.
[tests] Added AES GCM unit test for CCryptoControl.
[docs] Add SRTO_CRYPTOMODE, SRT_REJ_CRYPTO, SRT_KM_S_BADCRYPTOMODE.
[API] Add GCM to the SRT API.

Refax: moved buffer tools to a separate file (#2499)

Co-authored-by: Mikołaj Małecki <mmalecki@haivision.com>
[core] Reject if SRT_MAGIC_CODE is not set in the HS induction response.
[core] Tune logs of group members adding and removing.
[core] Fixed AES-GCM support check.
[core] Protocol: set AES-GCM auth in the KM message.
[core] Use setDataPacketTS to timestamp data packets (#2489).

[docs] Fixed the build-win.md (#2487)

Fixed links in the table of contents.
Fixed the Win64OpenSSL download link.
[core] Made offset consistent with avail_bufsize. (#2465)

[core] Fixed message seqno check.

The retransmission flag has to be supplied, otherwise, a packet might be falsely considered a filter packet.
[core] Minor edits to the CRcvBuffer::getTimespan_ms().

[core] CRYSPR GCM: fixed usage of the aes_gcm_cipher(..) prototype.
Renamed CRYSPR_AUTHTAGMAX to HAICRYPT_AUTHTAG_MAX and relocated.
[core] CRYSPR: Add AES GCM mode with OpenSSL EVP (#2476).
[core] Replaced m_iRcvLastSkipAck with m_iRcvLastAck in logs.

[core] Add auth tag to the sender buffer.
The additional space to be used for auth tag in GCM AEAD.
[core] Add capacity property to CPacket.

[docs] Defined a reason to use C++11 on Windows

instead of pthreads port.
[core] Changed CUnit::m_iFlag type to bool.
[core] Renamed buffer.cpp to buffer_snd.cpp.
[core] Renamed CRcvBufferNew to CRcvBuffer

[core] Removed old receiver buffer
and ENABLE_NEW_RCVBUFFER build option.
[core] Combined the loops of m_FreshLoss and m_pRcvLossList
[core] Replaced reorder_prevent_lossreport with initial_loss_ttl.
[core] Also protected m_pRcvLossList->insert() with m_RcvBufferLock.
[core] Moved m_FreshLoss.push_back() out of the incoming loop.
[core] Cleanup the useless tnkeep.
[core] Mark m_pRcvLossList and m_FreshLoss to be guarded by m_RcvLossLock.
[core] Fixed missing m_RcvLossLock in processData().
[core] Improved logs of core.cpp with CONID()
[core] Added a trailing space in CONID()
[tests] Added a couple of tests on RCV loss list.
[build] Fix MacOS Build with SDK-10.5 (#2462).
[core] Improved some logs for the no room issue.
[core] Fixed CRcvLossList can not remove m_iMaxSeqNo.
[core] Fixed some wrong usages of m_iMaxSeqNo.
[apps] UriParser: fixed protocol type detection (#2452).
[docs] Updated docs on release notes generation

[build] Find GTest using version range 1.8-1.12.

Version ranges are only supported with CMake 3.19 or later.
Fallback to GTest v1.8 with older CMake versions.
